name: Bouncez - Bounce to the Sky
description:
Please beware of the Most addictive Endless – Music Bouncing ball game

The newest Amanotes’ will absolutely make you unable to Take your eyes off the screen.

Your goal is to jump to the highest as you can. Move left or right and auto-jump from platform edges, to jump up and collect diamond!

Your Newest Lover:

◉ Non – Stop together
◉ Go wild with your Jams
◉ Thrilling Beats
◉ One – Handed hand
◉ Illustrative, Tripping, Bouncy graphic
◉ Update the newest EDM songs
◉ Upload your own song

How to master your bouncy ball:

- Listening to your beats, utilizing your incredible reflexes, bounce your 3d bounty ball from different bouncing plates.

- Following the flow of your bouncy music and you can never miss any jump to bounce your sparkling ball!

- Make as much crazy bouncy, jumps faster as you can.

- Share your insane scores to let your friends know that they have been bounced.

Free songs and amazing gifts are waiting for you to take.

Beat Jumper is the official games of Amanotes, a fast-growing app publisher from Vietnam with global reach. With more than 3.000.000+ download all over the world, all players around the globe can enjoy this 3d ball with the same thrill of the competition and sharing the enjoyable moment with each other.

Contact us:

Are you having problems? Send an email to support@amanotes.com

Special Note:

In the game “Beat Jumper: EDM up!" the user can login using platform account (Facebook) and can synchronize the history data of the bouncy ball, you can restore the process and your purchased items, ratings, friends, etc, without purchasing any accumulated value.
